title: How Can I Communicate with My Mother-in-Law?
description:
Tammy says her mother-in-law is difficult to get along with and that trying to discuss their differences with her only makes things worse. - Dr. Laura: "Thank your husband for being a real man who can handle his mother for you both."

Have you had difficulty relating to your in-laws? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
